name: noncellular
content:
noncellular adjective
(PHONE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected to a telephone system by wires rather than by radio signals: I made the call on a standard noncellular telephone line. The market for non-cellular devices is still growing.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can opt to join either a cellular or a non-cellular network.We are seeing a huge growth in markets for noncellular handheld devices.
noncellular adjective
(BIOLOGICAL SUBSTANCE)
biology
  specialized not involving or made of cells: Plasma is the non-cellular portion of the blood. A new cell can never be created from a noncellular substance.
More examplesFewer examplesThese tiny organisms are encased in a noncellular cuticle.
